com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec

Interface RmtesDecoder


  • public interface RmtesDecoder
    Used to decode RMTES data from a Buffer using RmtesBuffer and RmtesCacheBuffer.
    See Also:
    RmtesBuffer, RmtesCacheBuffer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasPartialRMTESUpdate(Buffer inBuffer)
      Returns boolean for whether RmtesBuffer contains a partial update command If RMTES content in an RmtesBuffer contains a partial update command, return true If RMTES content in an RmtesBuffer does not contain a partial update command, return false
      int RMTESApplyToCache(Buffer inBuffer, RmtesCacheBuffer cacheBuffer)
      Applies the inBuffer's partial update data to the cacheBuffer.
      int RMTESToUCS2(RmtesBuffer rmtesBuffer, RmtesCacheBuffer cacheBuffer)
      Converts the given cache to UCS2 Unicode Typical use:
      1.

    • Method Detail

      • RMTESToUCS2

        int RMTESToUCS2(RmtesBuffer rmtesBuffer,
                RmtesCacheBuffer cacheBuffer)
        Converts the given cache to UCS2 Unicode Typical use:
        1. Allocate memory for the cache buffer.
        2. After decoding the payload buffer, call RMTESApplyToCache to copy the data to the RmtesCacheBuffer.
        3. Allocate memory for the unicode string.
        3. Call RMTESToUCS2 to convert the RMTES data for display or parsing.
        Parameters:
        rmtesBuffer - Buffer used to store decoded RMTES data
        cacheBuffer - Buffer containing encoded RMTES data
        Returns:
        CodecReturnCodes

      • hasPartialRMTESUpdate

        boolean hasPartialRMTESUpdate(Buffer inBuffer)
        Returns boolean for whether RmtesBuffer contains a partial update command If RMTES content in an RmtesBuffer contains a partial update command, return true If RMTES content in an RmtesBuffer does not contain a partial update command, return false
        Parameters:
        inBuffer - Buffer containing encoded RMTES Data.
        Returns:
        Boolean whether the RMTES Data contains a partial RMTES Update

      • RMTESApplyToCache

        int RMTESApplyToCache(Buffer inBuffer,
                      RmtesCacheBuffer cacheBuffer)
        Applies the inBuffer's partial update data to the cacheBuffer. Preconditions: cacheBuffer is large enough to handle the additional data cacheBuffer has already been populated with data Result: inBuffer's partial update(s) are applied to outBuffer
        Parameters:
        inBuffer - Buffer containing encoded RMTES data
        cacheBuffer - Buffer used to store encoded RMTES data and for finding any partial RMTES updates
        Returns:
        CodecReturnCodes
